# PCA function
```{r}
calc_pca <- function(object,
                     assay_name = "counts", filter) {
  assert_that(
    is_hermes_data(object),
    is.string(assay_name)
  )
  
  x_samples <- assay(object, assay_name)
  # x_sampes_filtered <- top_genes(
  #   object = object,
  #   assay_name = assay_name,
  #   summary_fun = rowVars,
  #   n_top = 500,
  # )
  x_genes <- t(x_sampes)
  gene_is_constant <- apply(x_genes, MARGIN = 2L, FUN = S4Vectors::isConstant)
  x_genes_remaining <- x_genes[, !gene_is_constant]
  
  pca <- stats::prcomp(
    x = x_genes_remaining,
    center = TRUE,
    scale = TRUE,
    tol = sqrt(.Machine$double.eps)
  )
  
  .HermesDataPca(pca)
}
```
